<header class='major'>
  <h2>Using ggplot2</h2>
</header>

You definnitely want to be using ggplot2.  It is the balls!

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
qplot(rnorm(1000))
```

Change up the theme and everything, man!

```{r}
qplot(rnorm(1000), color=I("white")) + theme_bw(25)
```
